summary: Web application with administrator privileges system

existing_features.title: Create an admin user management page in the admin panel that displays all administrators and allows adding or removing admin privileges
Add a 'User Management' navigation link to the admin sidebar that routes to the administrator management page

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a user role management system in the backend that allows assigning and revoking administrator privileges to specific user principals

projectName: Add administrator privileges into this site
